snippet: The most bizarre creations of Blaine Halvorson – a designer of rugged clothing and a voracious collector of myriad curiosities – are the macabre installations that fill his 4,500-square-foot studio in Culver City, Calif.
abstract: The most bizarre creations of Blaine Halvorson – a designer of rugged clothing and a voracious collector of myriad curiosities – are the macabre installations that fill his 4,500-square-foot studio in Culver City, Calif.

headline.main: A Studio Visit With Blaine Halvorson
headline.print_headline: Weird Doesn’t Begin To Describe It
